And this has happened before then:
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,278866.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,278866.0.html[/url]
This makes me laugh.
you guys and your fucking cliques.

item.title: Bullshit
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Ok, I’ve done it by the book, the following 3 posters got moderated, which I consider fair because they are generally respectable members of the community, and while I was at it I’ve upped yours(Swordskid) to a mute because of your previous record. Next time you’ll receive a 2 week ban. Yes - I did make a note of this in the moderator section.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullshit
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

code (Greeny) lolz
(08:14:02) (Greeny) Lothy 08:04:09 AM Viewing the topic Bullshit…
(08:14:03) (Greeny) om
(08:14:20) (&Lothy) Greeny: www.demoted.com for you
(08:14:21) (&Lothy) sorry
(08:14:32) (Greeny) Adult Warning
(08:14:34) (Greeny) LOOOL
(08:14:40) (Greeny) Lothy linked me to porn![/code]

Oh well. I’m sure legit’s return is imminent.

If the above is true then I have heard upon demotion one does not receive a squirtle, therefore:
[i]
Dear moparisthebest.com administration,

It is I, Greeny writing to inform you of my immediate resignation (actually not immediate, but just as you lose temper and are about to hit the demotion button I’d like this letter to come into full effect). I am resigning from my position as moderator due to unforeseen circumstances, mainly that I heard if I resign I get a squirtle (although I’d prefer a bulbasaur). If this information was false I would like you to dismiss the letter.

Also, fuck you.

Much love,

Greeny

PS, I would like to suggest Frank_ and Stork as a suitable replacement (It takes 2 mere humans to replace 1 blob).
[/i]

EDIT:

code (Greeny) Lothy did you know demoted.com was porn
(08:39:09) (Greeny) ??
(08:39:24) (&Lothy) no Greeny
(08:39:32) (Greeny) ic
(08:39:33) (&Lothy) i typed it in as a spur of the moment thing to get you worried
(08:39:35) (&Lothy) l0l[/code]

The blob was tricked

It is of course humour that drives me.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullshit
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

I don’t see why some posts received multiple punishments for one post. I think that is moderation taken too far. Take your moderating powers where they belong… To the posts that really need moderating…

Read full topic

item.title: Bullshit
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

I managed to drive xxlegitxx away from posting

He still logs in daily…

Anyway, I locked that topic because Niall forgot to (or maybe he didn’t mean to) but personally I thought it should have been locked. Anyway, you posted referring back to another topic complaining about me, so I presume you’re moaning that I got no punishment, again.

“Massive Failure” was actually referring to the topic as a whole, because you made some pretty stupid posts, so I wasn’t just referring to OP.

So, to be perfectly honest with you Swordskid61, billygotshot, I couldn’t give a flying fuck whether you’re bothered I don’t get punished for a post at the end of fucked up topic, because it’s me taking the action to close the threads and stop the spam continuing, you only fucking complain because you yourselves get punished. If you don’t like it fuck off like xxfegittxx did.

If I gave a shit about people’s opinion of me I wouldn’t be on a last warning, would I?
The simple truth is, I aim to do a decent job here, if I can’t get away with a fun post now and then, then you can take the moderator position and shove it up your assholes because I seriously don’t give a shit. It’s voluntary, and your lucky I help with such a fucked up community. It’s not like I do a bad job, since I’m more active than half the Gmods++ anyway.

I could easily have gone back and edited any of my posts to cover myself, I never have because I’m not a fucking pussy like you tight arsed fags.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullshit
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

I agree with Niall and Mopman, it was stupid of us do it. He just was saying Hello. The Elitist shit like that really does screw the community up. Instead of hating on him for making an introduction topic, we should have welcomed him. Nowhere does it say he can’t make a Introduction topic.

Haha,I don’t know why sword is crying about this…You guys clearly deserved what came to you.There was no need for that,at least ThAt0n36Uy realized it.

But also,its clear that mods to favor the “Elites” of the community.

Read full topic
